name: Workflow86
headline: AI Workflow Engineer for automating your business operations
description:
Workflow86 is your on-demand AI workflow engineer that designs, builds and edits complete end-to-end automated workflows and business processes based on your instructions. 

Workflow86 turns any description of a business process or procedure into an automated workflow with fully configured forms, tasks, integrations, notifications, document generation and more. Deploy highly customized business processes and workflows that work with your existing systems in minutes, and just as easily edit and iterate on them with no-code, code or AI assistance.

founders.name: Aaron Tran, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Workflow86, an AI-first workflow automation platform where AI handles the entire process of designing, building, and editing your internal business processes and operations.

generated_description:
**Workflow86: Your AI Workflow Engineer for Business Automation**

**Overview:**
Founded in 2021 and a participant in Y Combinator's W22 batch, Workflow86 is based in Sydney, Australia, and is comprised of a nimble team of six. The company's mission is simple yet impactful: to serve as an AI Workflow Engineer, automating business operations seamlessly.

**What They Do:**
Workflow86 transforms any description of a business process into a fully automated, end-to-end workflow. This includes everything from forms and tasks to integrations and document generation. You essentially tell Workflow86 what you need, and it designs, builds, and also allows for easy edits to suit your organization’s unique operations—all without the need for extensive coding knowledge.

**Key Features:**
1. **AI-Powered Design**: Workflow86 uses natural language processing to generate workflows, making it intuitive to create complex automations.
2. **Flexibility**: The platform supports both no-code and custom code solutions, letting users tweak their workflows manually or leverage AI for modifications.
3. **Integration Ready**: With compatibility for existing systems (like ERPs or CRMs) and a variety of pre-built integrations, businesses can quickly deploy custom workflows that fit right into their existing tech stack.
4. **User-Friendly Interface**: A drag-and-drop interface ensures that even non-technical users can navigate and set up intricate workflows effortlessly.

**Applications:**
Workflow86 caters to multiple departments and use cases—Sales (lead management), Marketing (campaign scheduling), HR (onboarding processes), and more. This versatility means it can help nearly any organization streamline their operations.

**Customer Feedback:**
Clients laud Workflow86 for enabling them to automate critical processes effectively. Notably, a Chief Technology Officer from a large firm noted they automated over 15 key operations, filling significant system gaps. Another user highlighted the efficiency gained from launching a workflow that would typically take weeks of development time, accomplishing it in under a day.

**Conclusion:**
In today's fast-paced business landscape, Workflow86 positions itself as a potent ally for companies looking to enhance their operational efficiencies through automation. With its AI-driven capabilities and user-friendly platform, it’s making the complexities of process automation accessible for everyone. If you’re interested in a trial, they offer a 14-day free trial—no credit card needed.

Explore more at [Workflow86](https://www.workflow86.com) and start automating today!
